subtypes.name: Standard Visitor Visa
subtypes.description: For tourism, business visits, or short-term studies.
subtypes.eligibility: Sufficient funds, intention to leave the UK after the visit.

subtypes.name: Family Visitor Visa
subtypes.description: For visiting family members in the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of relationship, sufficient funds, intention to return home.

subtypes.name: Child Visitor Visa
subtypes.description: For children under 18 visiting the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Parental consent, sufficient funds, proof of accommodation.

subtypes.name: Business Visitor Visa
subtypes.description: For attending meetings, conferences, or other business-related activities.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of business activity, sufficient funds, intention to return home.

subtypes.name: Sports Visitor Visa
subtypes.description: For athletes and support staff attending sports events.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of participation in sports events, sufficient funds.

subtypes.name: Entertainer Visitor Visa
subtypes.description: For artists, entertainers, and musicians performing in the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of participation in cultural events, sufficient funds.

subtypes.name: Marriage Visitor Visa
subtypes.description: For individuals planning to get married or register a civil partnership in the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of marriage plans, sufficient funds.

subtypes.name: Skilled Worker Visa
subtypes.description: For individuals offered a job in the UK by an approved employer.
subtypes.eligibility: Job offer, sponsorship, and meeting skill requirements.

subtypes.name: Health and Care Worker Visa
subtypes.description: For medical professionals to work in the NHS or adult social care.
subtypes.eligibility: Job offer in healthcare, sponsorship.

subtypes.name: Temporary Worker Visa
subtypes.description: For short-term work, including charity, creative, or seasonal work.
subtypes.eligibility: Sponsorship and proof of work.

subtypes.name: High Potential Individual Visa
subtypes.description: For graduates from top global universities to work in the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Degree from an eligible university, sufficient funds.

subtypes.name: Innovator Visa
subtypes.description: For experienced businesspersons establishing an innovative business.
subtypes.eligibility: Business endorsement, sufficient funds.

subtypes.name: Start-up Visa
subtypes.description: For individuals starting a new business in the UK for the first time.
subtypes.eligibility: Business endorsement, sufficient funds.

subtypes.name: Global Business Mobility Visa
subtypes.description: For overseas businesses transferring staff to the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Sponsorship, proof of work.

subtypes.name: International Sportsperson Visa
subtypes.description: For elite athletes and coaches coming to the UK to take part in a sporting event.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of sporting achievement, sponsorship.

subtypes.name: Student Visa
subtypes.description: For individuals pursuing higher education in the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Offer from a licensed UK educational institution, sufficient funds, and English proficiency.
subtypes.validity: Duration of the course plus 4 months

subtypes.name: Child Student Visa
subtypes.description: For children aged 4 to 17 to study at an independent school in the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Offer from a UK school, parental consent, and sufficient funds.

subtypes.name: Short-term Study Visa
subtypes.description: For studying English language courses up to 11 months.
subtypes.eligibility: Offer from a UK institution, sufficient funds, and intention to leave after the course.

subtypes.name: Family Visa
subtypes.description: For individuals wishing to live with their family members in the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of relationship, adequate income, sponsorship.

subtypes.name: Partner Visa
subtypes.description: For individuals wishing to live with their partner in the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of relationship, sufficient income.

subtypes.name: Indefinite Leave to Remain (ILR)
subtypes.description: For individuals who have lived in the UK for a certain period and wish to settle.
subtypes.eligibility: Minimum residency requirement, good character, knowledge of language and life in the UK.

subtypes.name: Direct Airside Transit Visa (DATV)
subtypes.description: For travelers transiting through UK airports.
subtypes.eligibility: Valid flight ticket, proof of onward travel.

subtypes.name: Visitor in Transit Visa
subtypes.description: For travelers wishing to enter the UK while transiting.
subtypes.eligibility: Valid flight ticket, proof of onward travel.

subtypes.name: Asylum Visa
subtypes.description: For individuals seeking asylum in the UK due to fear of persecution.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of persecution in home country.

subtypes.name: Refugee Family Reunion Visa
subtypes.description: For family members of refugees in the UK.
subtypes.eligibility: Proof of relationship to the refugee.
